valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 2 Feb 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 3 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low mid-Atlantic 969, slow moving, filling 975 by midday tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In southwest, rough or very rough. in northeast, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, snow showers. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
21:55 (UTC) on Mon 2 Feb 2026
Southeasterly gale force 8 increasing severe gale force 9 later
